rows.name: text_top_1
rows.value:
Start with any number, say 20. Let your child decide whether to go first or second. During their turn, a player may subtract any divisor of the current number from the number. The player forced to 0 loses.

After your child becomes familiar with the game, encourage them to look for the remarkably simple strategy for playing it - once they discover it, see if they can explain why it works.
